Name: Escape Room
About the game: You Wake Up. You noticed that you were trapped in a small room. A clock displayed on the wall has counted down. Let's escape from the room by solving some mystery. [Caution] This Game Is Only For Htc Vive. You can explore every corner of the room by making use of the room scale of HTC Vive.
